channel.title: Network on Dev Pages
channel.description: Recent content in Network on Dev Pages

item.title: Building My Own Firewall Router with OPNsense: A Journey in Home Network Security
item.description: Some practical benefits running OPNsense on your home network. It vastly improves safety for anyone at home using the internet.

item.title: Setting up a home CentOS 7 server with OwnCloud
item.description: Lessons from High Performance Browser Networking from Ilya Grigorik. Fantastic resource, great help to understand how networks work.
